# imageView

**Instance Property**

Image displayed by the cell.

## Declaration

```swift
@IBOutlet @MainActor unowned(unsafe) var imageView: NSImageView? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property is typically configured when the row is created in the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTableViewDataSource] protocol method [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTableViewDelegate/tableView(_:viewFor:row:)].

## Displayed Items

- **textField**: Text displayed by the cell.
